entry.title: gc-victor/reactive-component: A lightweight, powerful Web Component library for building reactive user interfaces with minimal boilerplate and maximum performance.
entry.content: A lightweight, powerful Web Component library for building reactive user interfaces with minimal boilerplate and maximum performance.

entry.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
entry.content: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

entry.title: waiz3ple/fractionability: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.

entry.title: Felicheat/stalker2-cfg-extension: A lightweight Visual Studio Code extension for validating Stalker 2 CFG file formats that use `struct.begin`/`struct.end` blocks. The extension checks for proper block nesting, indentation, and header parameter formatting, providing real-time diagnostics to help you catch mistakes as you code.
entry.content: A lightweight Visual Studio Code extension for validating Stalker 2 CFG file formats that use `struct.begin`/`struct.end` blocks. The extension checks for proper block nesting, indentation, and header parameter formatting, providing real-time diagnostics to help you catch mistakes as you code.

entry.title: aderahenry/react-fatless-form: A lightweight React form package designed for simplicity that simplifies form handling and validation without unnecessary complexity or bloat.
entry.content: A lightweight React form package designed for simplicity that simplifies form handling and validation without unnecessary complexity or bloat.

entry.title: trifkee/NavKit: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.
entry.content: A lightweight and flexible navigation library for handling keyboard and remote-based navigation in web and TV applications. With built-in support for directional movement, focus management, and cyclic navigation, NavKit ensures a seamless user experience across different input devices.

entry.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

entry.title: Pragadees15/todo-list: A simple and lightweight Todo List application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include adding, marking as completed, and deleting todos, with persistent storage using localStorage.

entry.content: Lightweight WASM Postgres with real-time, reactive bindings.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
